sections.heading: Failure to appear; issuance of arrest warrantIf at the time fixed for appearance the defendant, who was properly noticed, fails to appear as required by the court, the court shall, on its own motion or on motion of the prosecuting attorney, immediately issue a warrant for the arrest of the defendant
sections.text: Failure to appear; issuance of arrest warrantIf at the time fixed for appearance the defendant, who was properly noticed, fails to appear as required by the court, the court shall, on its own motion or on motion of the prosecuting attorney, immediately issue a warrant for the arrest of the defendant.Amended by Acts 1975, No. 781, ยง1; Acts 1993, No. 834, ยง1, eff. June 22, 1993; Acts 2004, No. 833, ยง1; Acts 2016, No. 613, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2017.
